EmailTemplate.description: Used to send the Seller the tracking code to send a title to a buyer
EmailTemplate.name: Seller Title Shipping Label
EmailTemplate.subject: Shipping Label for {!Case.Vehicle_Year__c} {!Case.Vehicle_Make__c} {!Case.Vehicle_Model__c} {!Case.Vehicle_VIN__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Print Shipping Label and Send Title Mail the vehicle title for the {!Case.Vehicle_Year__c} {!Case.Vehicle_Make__c} {!Case.Vehicle_Model__c} ({!Case.Vehicle_VIN__c}) to ACV as soon as possible.
ACV Auctions 640 Ellicott St, Suite 321 Buffalo, NY 14203
Print the Shipping Label: {!Case.Easypost_PostageLabel_Label_URL__c}
